name: Right Now G-Man
description:
You play as Ace, a Rather dapper detective with a dice for a head.  Get through as many rooms  as possible whilst managing buffs and debuffs that apear at random.

Controls 

left/right - A and D

Jump- Space

Aim with your mouse, and click to shoot

the game is infinite, (for now), try and get as far as you can!

Special thanks to Crowmad for the help with sprites and brainstorming.

I hope you Enjoy the game, have a pleasant Existence
